allData.occupation: Senior UX Designer @ Nikola Motor Company | Automotive HMI UX/UI | Passionate About the Green Revolution in Mobility

positions.title: Senior UX Designer
positions.description: At Nikola Corporation, I’ve contributed to the design and development of human-machine interface (HMI) systems for Tre BEV and Tre FCEV vehicles. My focus has been on creating intuitive designs that enhance driver experience and operational efficiency, incorporating user research to reduce cognitive load and improve functionality. Working closely with product managers and cross-functional teams, I’ve ensured that our solutions meet business goals, adhere to regulatory standards, and align with sustainability objectives for ZEV fleets.

positions.title: UX Designer
positions.description: As a Freelance UX Designer, I transformed websites into user-friendly interfaces, utilizing stakeholder interviews, competitive analysis, and mood board surveys to align design solutions with client goals. I focused on creating seamless user experiences through prototyping, wireframing, and leveraging research to deliver high-quality, functional designs tailored to diverse audience needs.

positions.title: UI Designer
positions.description: In my role as UI Designer, I established cohesive visual language and style guides that enhanced usability and streamlined development for fleet operators and service teams. By collaborating with cross-disciplinary teams, I improved interface designs for monitoring uptime, truck performance, and energy optimization. My work emphasized design consistency, reduced development time, and supported user needs across Nikola’s suite of innovative products.

positions.title: Professional Photographer
positions.description:
• Created high-impact images for editorial lookbooks and products for brands.
• Collaborated directly with clients to gain insights into their business objectives and deliver tailored visual solutions.
• Organized production teams, including talent casting, location scouting, and overseeing creative direction to ensure a cohesive visual narrative.
• Experienced in film scanning, color grading, and retouching to enhance the integrity of the film and ensure high-quality final results.
Clients: Urban Outfitters, Free People, Avenue Boutique, Swindlers, Nuraxi

educations.schoolName: The Coding Bootcamp at UNC-Chapel Hill

certifications.name: Full-Stack Web Development
certifications.authority: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

allData.headline: Senior UX Designer @ Nikola Motor Company | Automotive HMI UX/UI | Passionate About the Green Revolution in Mobility
allData.summary:
As a Senior UX Designer with over 4 years of experience, I’ve specialized in creating intuitive human-machine interface (HMI) systems and designing user-centered solutions within the automotive industry. Colleagues would describe me as adaptable, detail- oriented, and collaborative, traits that have enabled me to translate complex challenges into innovative designs that enhance operational efficiency and elevate the driver experience.
Throughout my career, I’ve focused on designing and implementing industry-leading solutions, including:
• Crafting HMI systems for Tre BEV and Tre FCEV, reducing cognitive load while optimizing usability.
• Establishing a comprehensive style guide that streamlined development and improved consistency across multiple products.
• Conducting user research to identify pain points, leading to designs that improved driver satisfaction and operational outcomes.
I am passionate about creating transformative experiences that empower users and elevate product capabilities. My ability to collaborate across teams, align with regulatory standards, and deliver adaptive solutions has positioned me as a trusted contributor to mission-critical projects. My passion for HMI design and excellence in user-centered research fuels my drive to continually push the boundaries of what is possible in business. Connect with me to talk about interaction design, usability testing, prototyping, or general industry news or updates.
